name: Ocean blob
description:
Ocean Blob is a simple underwater 2D platformer. 

Some levels, at the start, might look easy. And if you think that- well you're right. But some other levels are difficult for no apparent reasons.

If you're planning on beating the entire game, good luck. 'Cause, you're gonna need it ;)

If you want to speedrun the game, then sure go ahead. But just before you start, know that there is an intentional bug - totally not an annoying load of errors that I can't fix - that makes your character go about 1.5x faster.

Here are the basic controls:

Hope you enjoy the game! And also don't die or else you will hear a very annoying noise.
